verbose_text: Furthermore, the observed overexpression of IL-6 and IL-8 in the MG activated cells (XREF_FIG) is a direct consequence of that glucose rich environment in the MG over-expressed hyperglycemic patients, and would face neuroinflammatory response [XREF_BIBR] in cataracts and a similar response to the expression of COX2 in MG activated cells [XREF_BIBR] and a direct correlation between MG and other inflammatory cytokines such as MCP1 and ICAM-1, towards an adaptive immune response.
